0064798.name: Wardrobe Hanging Rail
0064798.desc:
Mix. Match. Make It Yours with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range.
Quick and easy to install, this Hanging Rail features a brushed aluminium finish and adds 565mm of hanging space to your Flexi Storage Wardrobe. Perfect for hanging larger garments like pants and jackets.
This Hanging Rail is designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm units).
Designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm Units)
Brushed Aluminium Finish
565mm of hanging space
Easy to install
Maximises vertical space in your wardrobe

2583990.name: Wardrobe 2 Shelves White
2583990.desc:
Mix. Match. Make It Yours with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range.
Quick and easy to install, these 18mm thick Shelves can be added and adjusted to any height in your Flexi Storage Wardrobe. Perfect for creating extra storage tiers so you can organise clothes, shoes, bags, and accessories.
This pack includes 2 white shelves and 8 shelf supports.
These Shelves are designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm units).
Designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm Units)

0039740.name: Wardrobe Mesh Shoe Rack
0039740.desc:
Mix. Match. Make It Yours with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range.
Quick and easy to install, this Mesh Shoe Rack features two storage tiers and can be added and adjusted to any height in your Flexi Storage Wardrobe. The smooth sliding metal runners and pull-out out design allows for easy access to stored footwear. Suitable for flats and heels.
This pack includes 1 mesh shoe rack, 2 metal runners and 4 fasteners.
This Mesh Basket is designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm units).

0039739.name: Wardrobe Mesh Basket
0039739.desc:
Mix. Match. Make It Yours with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range.
Quick and easy to install, this Mesh Basket features smooth sliding metal runners and can be added and adjusted to any height in your Flexi Storage Wardrobe. The mesh design allows for easy identification of contents while also providing air circulation around stored items.
This pack includes 1 mesh basket, 2 metal runners and 4 fasteners.
This Mesh Basket is designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm units).

0064797.name: Wardrobe Glass Front Drawer
0064797.desc:
Mix. Match. Make It Yours with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range.
Quick and easy to install, this Drawer features smooth sliding metal runners and a glass front for easy identification of contents. Install at any height in your Flexi Storage Wardrobe and store clothes, shoes, bags, and accessories.
This Drawer is designed for use with the Flexi Storage Wardrobe range (excluding Corner and 400mm units).
